name: DODGEBALL 4096
description:
This is my entrie for the LowRez GameJam 2018! It is a little top-down local multiplayer game, you have to hit your enemy 3 times to win!

We made it in 4 days, not using the full lenght of the Jam but it was really fun and I think we did reach our goal!

CONTROLS:

PLAYER 1: WASD to move, G to shoot.
PLAYER 2: ARROWS to move, L to shoot.
MOUSE to select.

SONGS CREDITS  :  https://opengameart.org/users/trevor-lentz
